remarks: The "closure" of an operation outside its domain, when the operation's value is a set in contrast to ~ ndmovcl where it is required that the domain contains the empty set ( ` (/) e. S ` ).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
ndmaov.1 $e |- dom F = ( S X. S ) $.
ndmaovcl.2 $e |- ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) -> (( A F B )) e. S ) $.
ndmaovcl.3 $e |- (( A F B )) e. _V $.
ndmaovcl $p |- (( A F B )) e. S $.
